channel.title: Webpack on Xiao.chen
channel.description: Recent content in Webpack on Xiao.chen

item.title: Use webpack bundle the frontend sample example
item.description: Initialization the structure 1# make the demo folder 2mkdir webpack-demo 3 4# init the project 5cd webpack-demo 6npm init -y 7npm install webpack webpack-cli --save-dev 8 9# set the project to private prevent and accidental publish to public hub 10# add the `"private": true,` to package.json 11 12# create config file for webpack keep empty temporary 13touch webpack.config.js 14 15mkdir dist src 16touch dist/index.html 17touch src/index.js A little the code to src/index.
